lyrics:
5 contributorsshe turns me on lyricsverse 1
were on the move
the ride was rough but she was smooth
waiting in the wings just doing her thing
locomoting to the groove

prechorus 1
number one have some fun thats the rule of the road
lois lane mary jane we may never get home
arlene annette angelina
making the scene in a green karmann ghia

chorus 1
just kiss it goodbye on the fly
alibi leave her wondering why
yeah i threw her away and i crave yesterday
now that shes gone now that shes gone she turns me on
she turns me on

verse 2
the style was wild like millionaires
my savoirfaire got everywhere
it was nothing but a thing if youre wondering
but now she isnt there

prechorus 2
suzie q peggy sue wont you tell me your name
betty lou make it two if you really got game
april and june got the word now
may got play in a lei at the luau
see smash mouth liveget tickets as low as 56you might also likechorus 1
just kiss it goodbye on the fly
alibi leave her wondering why
yeah i threw her away and i crave yesterday
now that shes gone now that shes gone she turns me on

refrain
now that shes gone she really turns me on

bridge
marlena tina and belinda
goodnight irene jean and lucinda
jackie o did she know
did she know

chorus 2
just kiss it goodbye on the fly
alibi leave her wondering why
yeah regret is a word that i never had heard
now thats shes gone now that shes gone
now that shes gone she turns me on

outro
now that shes gone she turns me on
now that shes gone she turns me on on on on on
now that shes gone she turns me on on on on on
now that shes gone she turns me onembed
